scripts.restart: npm run stop && npm run dev
scripts.logs:api: docker compose -f infra/docker-compose.yml -f infra/docker-compose.dev.yml logs -f api
scripts.logs:bot: docker compose -f infra/docker-compose.yml -f infra/docker-compose.dev.yml logs -f bot
scripts.typecheck: cd packages/llama-api && bunx tsc --noEmit && cd ../llama-bot && bunx tsc --noEmit
scripts.verify: npm run typecheck && cd packages/llama-api && DATABASE_URL=postgresql://user:password@localhost:5432/dbname bunx prisma validate
scripts.db:studio: cd packages/llama-api && export $(cat ../../infra/.env.local | grep -v '^#' | grep -v '^$' | xargs) && bunx prisma studio
